languages.text: "Мы могли бы задержаться на орбите и предпринять определенные усилия для поиска дознавателя или шаттла, но, учитывая обстоятельства на планете и способность дознавателя оставаться ненайденным, когда ему того хочется... Я не уверена, что вы можете рассчитывать на скорый успех. Боюсь, Хейнрикс ван Калокс покинул вашу свиту навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "Мы могли бы задержаться на орбите и предпринять определенные усилия для поиска дознавателя или шаттла, но, учитывая обстоятельства на планете и способность дознавателя оставаться ненайденным, когда ему того хочется... Я не уверена, что вы можете рассчитывать на скорый успех. Боюсь, Хейнрикс ван Калокс покинул вашу свиту навсегда".

languages.text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'
languages.original_text: "Мы могли бы задержаться на орбите и предпринять определенные усилия для поиска дознавателя или шаттла, но, учитывая обстоятельства на планете и способность дознавателя оставаться ненайденным, когда ему того хочется... Я не уверена, что вы можете рассчитывать на скорый успех. Боюсь, Хейнрикс ван Калокс покинул вашу свиту навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the interrogator to remain undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on a quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox left your escort forever.'

"We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the interrogator to remain undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on a quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox left your escort forever.'

"We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

"We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

"We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

languages.text: “我们可以继续在轨道上停留，想办法寻找审讯官或是穿梭机的踪迹。不过，那位审讯官把行踪掩饰得非常隐蔽。考虑到这颗行星的当前情况，我不确定我们能否真的很快找到他们。恐怕海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯已经永远地离开了您的舰队。”
languages.original_text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

traits.locale_text: “我们可以继续在轨道上停留，想办法寻找审讯官或是穿梭机的踪迹。不过，那位审讯官把行踪掩饰得非常隐蔽。考虑到这颗行星的当前情况，我不确定我们能否真的很快找到他们。恐怕海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯已经永远地离开了您的舰队。”

languages.text: «Podríamos quedarnos en órbita y tratar de encontrar al interrogador o la lanzadera, pero, dadas las circunstancias del planeta y la capacidad del interrogador de permanecer oculto cuando quiere... no creo que sea un proceso rápido. Me temo que Heinrix van Calox ha abandonado su séquito definitivamente».
languages.original_text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

traits.locale_text: «Podríamos quedarnos en órbita y tratar de encontrar al interrogador o la lanzadera, pero, dadas las circunstancias del planeta y la capacidad del interrogador de permanecer oculto cuando quiere... no creo que sea un proceso rápido. Me temo que Heinrix van Calox ha abandonado su séquito definitivamente».

languages.text: "Wir könnten im Orbit bleiben und versuchen, den Interrogator oder das Shuttle zu finden, aber angesichts der Umstände auf dem Planeten und der Fähigkeit des Interrogators, unentdeckt zu bleiben, wenn er es will ... bin ich nicht sicher, dass Ihr auf einen schnellen Erfolg zählen könnt. "Ich fürchte, Heinrix van Calox hat Euer Gefolge für immer verlassen.
languages.original_text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

traits.locale_text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

languages.text: « Nous pourrions rester en orbite et tenter de retrouver van Calox ou la navette, mais au vu de la situation sur la planète et le talent de l'interrogateur à demeurer invisible lorsqu'il le souhaite... je crains qu'il faille vous armer de patience. Tout porte à croire qu'il a quitté votre suite pour de bon. »
languages.original_text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

traits.locale_text: « Nous pourrions rester en orbite et tenter de retrouver van Calox ou la navette, mais au vu de la situation sur la planète et le talent de l'interrogateur à demeurer invisible lorsqu'il le souhaite... je crains qu'il faille vous armer de patience. Tout porte à croire qu'il a quitté votre suite pour de bon. »

languages.text: 「軌道上に留まって、インテロゲイターかシャトルを探すこともできますが、惑星の状況と、自由に操れるインテロゲイターの隠密能力を考えると…すぐに成果が出ると期待はできません。残念ですが、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスが仲間に戻ることはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'

traits.locale_text: 「軌道上に留まって、インテロゲイターかシャトルを探すこともできますが、惑星の状況と、自由に操れるインテロゲイターの隠密能力を考えると…すぐに成果が出ると期待はできません。残念ですが、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスが仲間に戻ることはないでしょう」

languages.text: "Yörüngede kalıp Sorgucu'yu ya da mekiği bulmaya çalışabiliriz ama gezegendeki vaziyeti ve Sorgucu'nun dilediğinde tespit edilmeden dolaşabilmesini göz önüne alırsak... Bunu kolayca başarabileceğimizi sanmıyorum. Korkarım Heinrix van Calox, maiyetinizden kalıcı olarak ayrıldı."
languages.original_text: "We could linger in orbit and make some effort to find the Interrogator or shuttle, but, given the circumstances on the planet and the ability of the Interrogator to go undetected when he wants to... I'm not sure you can count on quick success. I am afraid Heinrix van Calox has left your retinue for good.'
